trans-unit.source: Represents a reference to the value of a property.
CodePropertyReferenceExpression can be used to represent a reference to the value of a property.
trans-unit.target: CodePropertyReferenceExpression 可以用來代表屬性的值的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A> property specifies the object that contains the property to reference.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A>屬性會指定包含要參考之屬性的物件。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression.PropertyName%2A> property specifies the name of the property to reference.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression.PropertyName%2A>屬性會指定要參考之屬性的名稱。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression.PropertyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This object does not have a property to indicate whether the reference is used in a `get` or `set`.
trans-unit.target: 此物件沒有屬性，指出是否在使用參考`get`或`set`。

trans-unit.source: If the property reference occurs on the left, assigned to, side of an assignment statement, then it is a `set`.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性參考，就會發生在左邊，指派給、 側邊的指派陳述式，則它是`set`。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression"></xref> class using the specified target object and property name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression"></xref>類別使用指定的目標物件和屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the object that contains the property to reference.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> ，表示包含屬性來參考的物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to reference.
Gets or sets the name of the property to reference.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要參考之屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to reference.
Gets or sets the object that contains the property to reference.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含要參考之屬性的物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the object that contains the property to reference.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> ，表示包含屬性來參考的物件。
